price: I said, ‘Seek forgiveness from your Lord. Indeed, He is Most Forgiving.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
